title: PPP SG commends Bilawal’s leadership, diplomatic skills
content:
PESHAWAR, Jun 11 (APP): Secretary General of the Pakistan People’s Party (PPP) Engineer Muhammad Humayun Khan has commended PPP Chairman Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, stating that his leadership and diplomatic skills have become a strong international representation for Pakistan.
In a statement issued here on Wednesday, he said that Bilawal Bhutto Zardari’s capabilities have earned him respect and recognition across the world. He added that the tireless efforts of the PPP chairman to promote Pakistan’s interests and enhance global cooperation are commendable.
He said that Bilawal’s vision has played a crucial role in shaping Pakistan’s foreign policy and strengthening our relations with other nations.
At the international level, he said that the presence of Bilawal Bhutto Zardari had elevated Pakistan’s image. Bilawal Bhutto has made every possible effort to promote a positive image of Pakistan and to dispel misunderstandings about our country, he added.
The PPP secretary general further stated that Bilawal’s passion, integrity and vision for the country have made a significant impact globally. “We are grateful to Bilawal Bhutto Zardari for raising Pakistan’s voice on the international stage,” he concluded.
